
# GAME ENGINE
___

See LICENSE file for license
___

## LEVEL CREATION TOOL
___

- render map

beginTextureMode();
	draw the layer;
endTexutreMode();

beginScissor(view);
	darwtexturesacle();
endScissor();

- zoom and map displacement
- texture render
- add texture name to t_level

- design inventory and item
___
